text: @realDonaldTrump @FoxNews WOW! The Trump Rally potentially exposed over 6200 people (who attended in person) to the LIFE THREATENING COVID-19 VIRUS. Isn’t it amazing that @realDonaldTrump doesn’t care how many people get sick or unknowingly pass the virus to their IMMUNE-COMPROMISED relatives & friends??
